readme_content:
## Hey 👋, I'm Shinjith Full stack developer from Kerala, India.
Currently working on [Profezzor](https://github.com/shinjith-dev/profezzor-frontend).
Trying to learn almost everything on late nights :)

shinjith-dev/notes-v2.summary: Recent activities in the notes-v2 repository include multiple push events focused on feature updates, such as adding links to pages, updating layouts, and configuring Decap CMS, all signed off by shinjith-dev. These updates indicate enhancements to the repository's functionality and setup, showcasing ongoing development efforts.

shinjith-dev/shinjith.dev.summary: The shinjith.dev repository has seen significant activity with push events aimed at fixing issues such as the navbar underline on mobile and description loading on the cover page. Additionally, features like adding a project page, dynamic experience section updates, and SEO optimization have been implemented, demonstrating active development and maintenance of the repository.

shinjith-dev/resume-template.summary: The resume-template repository has undergone updates, including migrating from Next to Vite, switching from npm to yarn, and updating web meta information. These changes, all made by shinjith-dev, indicate a focus on modernizing and refining the repository's structure and dependencies.

profile_summary: I'm a full stack developer from Kerala, India, with a strong foundation in TypeScript, C, and JavaScript, currently working on various projects including Profezzor. With a network of 10 followers and 45 public repositories, I'm dedicated to continuously learning and expanding my skillset, with a personal website at shinjith.dev and active presence on platforms like Instagram, DEV.to, and LinkedIn.
